languages.text: "А, гнилостное пятно среди знатных родов. Скрывался в своем имении, пряча уродства, однако не мог держать язык за зубами — плодил скверну в умах придворных, отрицал возможность изменения человеческой судьбы, возводил напраслину на традиции мира, дерзил, сквернословил... по счастью, нет у него наследников, и потому проклятый род имеет шанс угомониться сегодня — раз и навсегда

traits.locale_text: "А, гнилостное пятно среди знатных родов. Скрывался в своем имении, пряча уродства, однако не мог держать язык за зубами — плодил скверну в умах придворных, отрицал возможность изменения человеческой судьбы, возводил напраслину на традиции мира, дерзил, сквернословил... по счастью, нет у него наследников, и потому проклятый род имеет шанс угомониться сегодня — раз и навсегда
traits.speaker: FW_Lawman

languages.text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."
languages.original_text: "А, гнилостное пятно среди знатных родов. Скрывался в своем имении, пряча уродства, однако не мог держать язык за зубами — плодил скверну в умах придворных, отрицал возможность изменения человеческой судьбы, возводил напраслину на традиции мира, дерзил, сквернословил... по счастью, нет у него наследников, и потому проклятый род имеет шанс угомониться сегодня — раз и навсегда

traits.locale_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut, — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this cursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

"Ah, a rotten stain among the noble families. He was hiding in his manor, concealing his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut, proliferating filth in tracts that he later sent out with his servants. He called the choice of one's own fate to be slavery, cast aspersions on the very traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely, condemned those who had chosen a new destiny... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today the cursed bloodline has a chance to be put to rest once and for all."

"Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

languages.text: “啊，贵族阶级的污点。他一直躲在他自己的庄园里，不让别人看到他畸形的身躯，但他始终都不肯闭嘴。他在朝臣之中传播腐化的思想，诽谤这个世界的传统。他傲慢无礼，满口粗鄙……好消息是，他没有任何后裔。今天，这支遭到诅咒的血脉将会被彻底根除。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

traits.locale_text: “啊，贵族阶级的污点。他一直躲在他自己的庄园里，不让别人看到他畸形的身躯，但他始终都不肯闭嘴。他在朝臣之中传播腐化的思想，诽谤这个世界的传统。他傲慢无礼，满口粗鄙……好消息是，他没有任何后裔。今天，这支遭到诅咒的血脉将会被彻底根除。”

languages.text: «Ah, una mancha purulenta entre las familias nobles. Se había recluido en su mansión para ocultar sus deformidades, pero no supo mantener la boca cerrada y propagó la corrupción entre los cortesanos, difamó las costumbres de este mundo, profirió insolencias, empleó lenguaje soez... Por suerte carece de herederos, y en el día de hoy su linaje maldito será erradicado de una vez por todas».
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, una mancha purulenta entre las familias nobles. Se había recluido en su mansión para ocultar sus deformidades, pero no supo mantener la boca cerrada y propagó la corrupción entre los cortesanos, difamó las costumbres de este mundo, profirió insolencias, empleó lenguaje soez... Por suerte carece de herederos, y en el día de hoy su linaje maldito será erradicado de una vez por todas».

languages.text: "Soylu aileler üzerindeki çürümüş bir leke. Biçimsizliğini gizlemek için malikânesinde saklansa da çenesini tutmakta zorlanıyordu. Saray erkânının zihinlerini yozlaştırdı, dünyanın geleneklerine kara çaldı, küstahlık yaptı... Neyse ki vârisi yok. Bu lanetli soy, bugün ebediyen sona erecek."
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

traits.locale_text: "Soylu aileler üzerindeki çürümüş bir leke. Biçimsizliğini gizlemek için malikânesinde saklansa da çenesini tutmakta zorlanıyordu. Saray erkânının zihinlerini yozlaştırdı, dünyanın geleneklerine kara çaldı, küstahlık yaptı... Neyse ki vârisi yok. Bu lanetli soy, bugün ebediyen sona erecek."

languages.text: 「あぁ、貴族の家系の腐敗した汚れです。彼は、自身の奇形を隠すために屋敷にこもっていましたが、口を閉じていることができず、汚れが広がり、使用人によって後で送られてきました。彼は、奴隷となる運命の選択を宣言し、惑星の慣習を中傷し、人を小馬鹿にし、冒涜的に宣言し、新たな運命を選択した者たちを非難しました。幸運にも、彼には世継ぎがいないため、今日を限りにこの呪われた血筋がなくなることになります」
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut, proliferating filth in tracts that he later sent out with his servants. He declared the choice of one's own fate to be slavery, cast aspersions on the very traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely, condemned those who had chosen a new destiny... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this cursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、貴族の家系の腐敗した汚れです。彼は、自身の奇形を隠すために屋敷にこもっていましたが、口を閉じていることができず、汚れが広がり、使用人によって後で送られてきました。彼は、奴隷となる運命の選択を宣言し、惑星の慣習を中傷し、人を小馬鹿にし、冒涜的に宣言し、新たな運命を選択した者たちを非難しました。幸運にも、彼には世継ぎがいないため、今日を限りにこの呪われた血筋がなくなることになります」

languages.text: « Cette pourriture est la honte des nobles familles de Thassera. S'il vivait terré dans son manoir pour dissimuler ses difformités, il était incapable de tenir sa langue et instillait son impiété dans l'esprit des courtisans, jetant des doutes sur les traditions du monde, faisant preuve d'insolence, jurant comme un charretier... Par chance, il n'a pas d'héritiers, de sorte qu'en ce jour de grâce, sa lignée maudite va s'éteindre définitivement. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."

traits.locale_text: « Cette pourriture est la honte des nobles familles de Thassera. S'il vivait terré dans son manoir pour dissimuler ses difformités, il était incapable de tenir sa langue et instillait son impiété dans l'esprit des courtisans, jetant des doutes sur les traditions du monde, faisant preuve d'insolence, jurant comme un charretier... Par chance, il n'a pas d'héritiers, de sorte qu'en ce jour de grâce, sa lignée maudite va s'éteindre définitivement. »

languages.text: "Ah, ein Schandfleck auf der weißen Weste der Adelsfamilien. Er hat sich in seinem Anwesen versteckt, um seine Deformierungen zu verbergen, konnte aber den Mund nicht halten. Er säte Verderbnis in den Köpfen seiner Höflinge, machte sich über die Traditionen der Welt lustig, war anmaßend, fluchte gottlos ... Zum Glück hat er keine Erben. Deshalb wird diese verfluchte Blutlinie heute ein für alle Mal ausgelöscht."
languages.original_text: "Ah, a rotten stain upon the noble families. He was hiding in his manor to conceal his deformities, but had trouble keeping his mouth shut — he spread corruption among the minds of courtiers, cast aspersions on the traditions of the world, was insolent, swore profanely... Luckily, he has no heirs, and today, this accursed bloodline shall be put to rest once and for all."
